text: @OregonGovBrown Do we do Viral Testing, or Antibody Testing?  Apparently, it makes a difference.  For, example, Antibody Testing may test positive if you've had the common cold (coranovirus version, not rhinovirus version).  Interesting... https://t.co/b23IPGokWv
